name: Vigilant Avenger (Demo Build!)
description:
This is our first project, which is the reason for it being a bit rough around the edges. It's a topdown shooter in which you fight mafia bad guys and corrupt cops. If you want to share feedback with us please message me on Discord: Maximus10294 #3628
